contract_details.description: Integrate advanced AI/ML capabilities into the swarm architecture, creating intelligent learning systems for automated optimization and decision support.
contract_details.background: With Thea interface established and swarm intelligence growing, Agent-6's architectural expertise is perfect for integrating AI/ML systems that enhance swarm learning and decision-making.
objectives: Design and implement ML-based code quality prediction system
Create intelligent bug detection and prevention algorithms
Implement learning systems for architectural pattern recognition
Build predictive analytics for system health monitoring
deliverables: ML-based code quality prediction and analysis system
Intelligent bug detection and prevention framework
Architectural pattern recognition and learning system
Predictive system health monitoring with ML insights
technical_requirements: Natural language processing for code analysis
Predictive modeling and statistical analysis tools
Data pipeline creation and management systems
success_criteria: ML-based code quality predictions achieve 85%+ accuracy
Bug detection system identifies 70%+ of potential issues
Performance optimization recommendations implemented with 40%+ improvement
Architectural pattern recognition operational across codebase
Predictive health monitoring provides actionable insights
Testing prioritization reduces test execution time by 30%

resources_required: Data processing and analysis tools (pandas, numpy)
NLP libraries for code analysis (transformers, spaCy)
Model training infrastructure (GPU access, cloud resources)

contract_history.details: AI/ML integration contract created for advanced swarm intelligence
